channel.title: Provyx - Healthcare Provider Data Guides
channel.description: Guides and articles on healthcare provider data, sales prospecting, and data quality.

item.title: The Hidden Cost of Bad Healthcare Provider Data
item.description: Bad provider data costs healthcare vendors millions in wasted outreach, lost deals, and damaged sender reputation. Learn where the costs hide and fix them.

item.title: NPI Registry: What It Gives You and What It Doesn't
item.description: Understand what's in the CMS NPI Registry and what's missing. A practical guide to NPI data fields, limitations, and how to fill gaps for outreach.

item.title: Build a Healthcare Marketing List That Converts
item.description: Step-by-step guide to building healthcare marketing lists that drive results. Data sources, verification, and segmentation for provider outreach.

item.title: Healthcare Provider Data Buying Guide for 2026
item.description: What to evaluate when buying healthcare provider data. Sourcing, verification, pricing models, and red flags to watch for when comparing data vendors.

item.title: CRM Data Decay: How Fast Provider Records Go Stale
item.description: Healthcare provider data decays faster than most B2B data. Learn the decay rates, causes, and practical strategies to keep your CRM provider records accurate.

item.title: Healthcare ABM Strategy: Target Practices First
item.description: Build a healthcare ABM strategy that targets practices as accounts. Account identification, multi-threading, and data requirements for ABM campaigns.

item.title: Medical Device Territory Planning with Provider Data
item.description: Plan medical device sales territories using verified provider data. Step-by-step guide to mapping surgeons, balancing workloads, and optimizing coverage.

item.title: ROI of Clean Provider Data for Healthcare Marketing
item.description: Calculate the ROI of investing in clean healthcare provider data. Framework for measuring revenue impact of better contacts and deliverability.

item.title: How to Build a Physician Prospect List for B2B Sales
item.description: Step-by-step guide to building a physician prospect list that converts. Covers ICP definition, data sources, verification, and list-to-pipeline workflow.

item.title: NPPES Data Download vs Commercial Provider Data: A Practical Comparison
item.description: Compare the free NPPES data download to commercial provider databases. Field-by-field breakdown of what you get, what is missing, and when each option makes sense.

item.title: How to Sell to Medical Practices: A B2B Sales Playbook
item.description: A practical B2B sales playbook for selling to medical practices. Covers buying dynamics, decision-maker identification, outreach channels, and common mistakes.

item.title: B2B Healthcare Lead Generation with Provider Data
item.description: How to generate B2B healthcare leads using provider data. Covers inbound and outbound strategies, data foundations, and measurement frameworks for healthcare sales teams.

item.title: How to Clean Healthcare Provider Data in Salesforce
item.description: A practical guide to auditing and cleaning healthcare provider data in Salesforce. Covers deduplication, NPI matching, address validation, and ongoing maintenance.

item.title: Best Healthcare Data Providers for Small Sales Teams
item.description: An honest comparison of healthcare data providers for small sales teams. Covers pricing models, what to evaluate, and how to pick a vendor that fits a 2-15 person team.

item.title: Healthcare Provider Firmographic Data: What It Is and Why It Matters
item.description: What healthcare provider firmographic data includes and how it differs from standard B2B firmographics. Covers key fields, use cases, and how to build a firmographic dataset.

item.title: Healthcare Account Planning: A Data-Driven Template
item.description: A practical healthcare account planning template for sales reps. Covers org structure, buying committees, installed technology, physician census, and action planning with provider data.

item.title: Data-Driven Cold Calling for Healthcare Sales
item.description: How to use provider data for pre-call research in healthcare sales. Covers the 5-minute research workflow, call timing, data-informed openers, and gatekeeper navigation.

item.title: B2B Healthcare Email Compliance: CAN-SPAM, Not HIPAA
item.description: B2B emails to physicians and practice administrators are governed by CAN-SPAM, not HIPAA. This guide explains the rules, common misconceptions, and compliance requirements.

item.title: Winning the Value Analysis Committee: A Vendor Guide
item.description: A practical guide for vendors preparing submissions to hospital value analysis committees. Covers VAC composition, the review process, building a financial case, and identifying a champion.

item.title: GPO Navigation for Medical Device Companies
item.description: A vendor-side guide to navigating group purchasing organizations (GPOs) in medical device sales. Covers major GPOs, contract tiers, purchasing commitments, and when to go direct.

item.title: The Hospital Buying Cycle: A Data-Mapped Guide for Vendors
item.description: A practical guide to the hospital buying cycle for vendors. Covers the 19+ month timeline, buying committee roles, budget cycles, fiscal year timing, and how to use provider data to identify where a hospital is in the cycle.

item.title: Healthcare Data Vendor Comparison 2026
item.description: Side-by-side healthcare data vendor comparison for 2026. Coverage, accuracy, pricing, and healthcare-specific features for IQVIA, Definitive Healthcare, ZoomInfo, Apollo, Cognism, Lusha, CarePrecise, and Provyx.

item.title: KOL Identification for Medical Device Companies
item.description: How medical device companies identify key opinion leaders (KOLs). Covers surgical KOL identification, procedure volume analysis, tiered engagement strategies, and data sources for finding emerging KOLs.

item.title: Pre-RFP Intelligence: Win Healthcare Deals Before the RFP Drops
item.description: How healthcare sales teams use pre-RFP intelligence to win deals before the formal procurement process begins. Technology install data, budget timing, and relationship strategies.

item.title: Medical Device Territory Assessment: Your First 90 Days
item.description: A practitioner-level playbook for new medical device reps inheriting a territory. Week-by-week guide covering data audit, provider census, account tiering, and execution planning.

item.title: PECOS Data for Sales Prospecting: What It Tells You That NPI Doesn't
item.description: How to use PECOS Medicare enrollment data for B2B sales prospecting. Covers what PECOS contains beyond NPI, how to access bulk data, limitations, and how to combine it with commercial provider data.

item.title: How to Find Physician Email Addresses for B2B Outreach
item.description: Practical guide to finding physician email addresses for B2B sales outreach. Covers legitimate sources, the problem with scraped lists, verification methods, compliance basics, and how to evaluate email data vendors.
